title: A freight worker strike is back on the table
itunes:title: A freight worker strike is back on the table
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: A union representing freight railroad workers rejected the most recent tentative contract with major railroads, meaning that a strike — and threat to the supply chain — is once again possible. Today, we’ll take a look at the concerns over working conditions and the costs of a strike. Plus, a sign of small business optimism, a drop in computer demand and discussion of financial reparations following a wrongful conviction.
